name: Out of Gear
description:
Play as a lost cog trying to return to its intended spot. Spin up walls, launch off ramps, and zip around at high speed. Made in 48 hours for Kenney Jam 2021 with the theme "rotation."

Bleeping Demo, Envision, and Rhinoceros by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
